# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses progress tracking.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause()
```

## Discussion

This method invokes the block for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/pausingHandler], if there is one, and ensures that any subsequent reads of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/isPaused] property return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

If the receiver has suboperations, the system pauses their progress as well.

## Controlling Progress

- **cancel()**: Cancels progress tracking.
- **resume()**: Resumes progress tracking.
- **resumingHandler**: The block to invoke when progress resumes.

items.description: The block to invoke when progress resumes.
items.name: resumingHandler
